Summary: no sound lites all around it changing colors
divs: Sighting DetailsI was maybe 16 years old playing basket ball with lots of other kids so I could not have been the only one that saw this thing. something caught my eye and I look up and tried to make sense of what I was looking at I first thought it was a helicopter but I did not hear the blades then I thought it was a plan but there was no sound and it stayed in one spot I could not take my attention away from this thing when I came back to my senses I had not realized that some time had passed it was like every thing around me continued and I was there but I wasn't and that the basketball court was full of kids and when I came out of looking at this thing all the kids were gone
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Elizabeth
There were no other sightings in Elizabeth on or around July 15th 1975
